Package com.sk89q.worldedit.command.tool.brush

Interface Brush

All Known Implementing Classes:
AngleBrush, BlendBall, BlobBrush, ButcherBrush, CatenaryBrush, CircleBrush, ClipboardBrush, CommandBrush, CopyPastaBrush, CylinderBrush, ErodeBrush, FallingSphere, FlattenBrush, GravityBrush, HeightBrush, HollowCylinderBrush, HollowSphereBrush, ImageBrush, LayerBrush, LineBrush, MorphBrush, OperationFactoryBrush, PopulateSchem, RaiseBrush, RecurseBrush, RockBrush, ScatterBrush, ScatterCommand, ScatterOverlayBrush, ShatterBrush, SmoothBrush, SnowSmoothBrush, SphereBrush, SplatterBrush, SplineBrush, StencilBrush, SurfaceSphereBrush, SurfaceSpline, SweepBrush
public interface Brush
A brush is a long-range build tool.

  • Method Details

    • build

      void build(EditSession editSession, BlockVector3 position, Pattern pattern, double size) throws MaxChangedBlocksException
      Build the object.
      Parameters:
      editSession - the EditSession
      position - the position
      pattern - the pattern
      size - the size of the brush
      Throws:
      MaxChangedBlocksException - if the maximum block change limit is exceeded

    • setsSynchronously

      default boolean setsSynchronously()
      If this brush is expected to set blocks synchronously, i.e. from one thread (at a time)
      Since:
      2.12.0
